channel.title: Log4j Exploitability Index
channel.description: Recent content on Log4j Exploitability Index

item.title: Siemens Opcenter EX CP Process Automation Control
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Siemens Advisory - SSA-661257: Apache Log4j Vulnerabilities https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-661247.pdf Community Resources Resource Link source https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-661247.pdf Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL CVE-2021-4104: Not vuln ; CVE-2021-44228: Workaround NCSC-NL Update to V18.1 or later version to fix CVE-2021-44228 CISAGov Update to V18.

item.title: Siemens SIMATIC WinCC
